page.title: 05Farming Butt Hatch Mr. Read
page.content: Mr. Read farms Butt Hatch. Beauchamp Roding. The farm is an amalgamtion of what used to be four farms - Hornets, Proctors, Slades and Butt Hatch. One of his dreams for the future would be to see the return of small farms. He has farmed all his life,his family having owned Butt Hatch for over one hundred years. He employs one full time man and one part time man to farm over six hundred acres. Twenty five years ago they needed five full time men. They drill two hundred weight to an acre and expect three to four tons yield. It takes an average of two and a half days to drill. He sprays for black grass, may weed, chick weed, bind weed, knot grass, field pansies and nettles.
